title: Kyoshin to Hyouka no Shiro
synopsis: The story is set in Nagasaki prefecture in Minami Shimabara city, the fabled origin of the Shimabara Rebellion that sent shockwaves through all of Japan in the early Edo period. It is also where a third-year junior high school student named Shirou spends his days with his school friends.
voices: ['Matsuoka, Yoshitsugu', 'Murase, Ayumu', 'Ootani, Yuuki', 'Park, Romi', 'Tadano, Youhei', 'Takahashi, Minami']
staff: [['Okamoto, Sae', ['Director', ' Character Design']], ['Takadera, Takeshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Fukuda, Chikayo', ['Music']], ['Kawamura, Shouta', ['Director of Photography']]]
